existing_features.title: Add a new Dashboard (Home page) card/section titled "Inside" that lets the user view and edit a freeform text block, similar to the existing "Quick Note" pattern, and persist its content in localStorage.
Place the new "Inside" section in a sensible location on the Dashboard page layout so it feels like part of the existing Home page flow and works well on mobile and desktop.

projectName: Add an editable "Inside" section to the Home (Dashboard) page
